alert.note: Alert for Franklin; Grand Isle (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Burlington (Northern Vermont and New York)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 24 at 2:58PM EDT until July 24 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Burlington
info.description: The National Weather Service in Burlington has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Clinton County in northern New York... Grand Isle County in northwestern Vermont... Northwestern Franklin County in northwestern Vermont... * Until 400 PM EDT. * At 258 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over West Plattsburgh, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is possible. Expect wind damage to trees and powerlines. * Locations impacted include... Plattsburgh, Beekmantown, Schuyler Falls, Chazy, Saranac, Mooers, Alburgh Village, Champlain, Swanton, South Alburgh, Alburgh, Alburgh Dunes State Park, North Hero, Swanton Village, Highgate Falls, Isle La Motte, Jericho, Dannemora, Peasleeville, and Rouses Point. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
